packageInfo.sellTalk: Shock! Non-stop internet and free wifi
packageInfo.shortDesc: Shock Price: Non-Stop internet 50GB at speed 20Mbps/FUP 384Kbps
packageInfo.longDesc: Shock Price: Non-Stop internet 50GB at speed 20Mbps then unlimited at 384Kbps + free dtac wifi price 280B/30D (excl.VAT).
packageInfo.termCond:
- Price is excluded VAT.
- To subscribe from 18 Aug 2023 to 31 Jan 2024.
- You can use internet at max speed 20Mbps, according to each package volume, then continue to use internet unlimited at max speed 384Kbps.
- You will get free unlimited dtac wifi.
- This package will be not auto renewal when the internet usage is exhausted and want to subscirbe again, you can subscirbe immediately.
- The maximum speed at 20Mbps/384Kbps, it's depending on the service area or use the service at that time.
- The Company reserves the right to manage network as appropriate in order to ensure network quality for all users.  The Company may consider limiting or reducing bit torrent usage, download or upload bit file or any usage that consumes big data volume that could impact network quality for other users, affect use, or cause injustice or damage to other users or the company's network or service. Reduce speed could be lower than what stated in package depending on usage, area and device.
- The company reserves the right to change the promotion as appropriate.
